author: USA TODAY, Rasha Ali, USA TODAY
title: 'My heart hurts': Cristina Cuomo reveals 14-year-old son Mario has COVID-19
description: Cristina Cuomo reveals her 14-year-old son, Mario, has become infected with COVID-19 and she's nursing him back to health.
content:
CNN anchor Chris Cuomo, brother of New York Governor Andrew Cuomo, tested positive for the coronavirus.
Associated Press
The Cuomo family has another member who's come down with COVID-19.
